LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_C.label: Dandelion
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Vasilek_C.description: A magazine-fed, five-shot 80mm rapid-fire mortar. Supports multiple shell types (HE, EMP, smoke, incendiary) and provides flexible tactical fire support.
LanguageData.Bullet_Caretta_Shell_HighExplosive.label: 80mm HE shell
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Skullcracker.label: "Skullcracker" 35mm autocannon
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Skullcracker.description: Point-defense against air (and ground). Twin-linked high-rate autocannon firing AP rounds with terrifying suppression against infantry and light armor.
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Skullcracker.label: 25mm AP round
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Sledgehammer.label: "Sledgehammer" 155mm howitzer
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_Sledgehammer.description:
Long-range precision fire support (155mm howitzer).
Ammo: HE (general-purpose), SADARM (anti-armor submunitions), Shrapnel (anti-infantry area kill).
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_RocketNest.label: "Steel Rain" long-range rocket launcher
LanguageData.DMS_Gun_RocketNest.description:
300mm long-range rocket artillery launcher.
Ammo: HE rocket (general-purpose), SADARM rocket (anti-armor submunitions), Cluster rocket (anti-infantry area kill).
